name: Rooting for you (G3GaByte)
description:
Ever wanted to partake in some friendly neighbourhood competition? Then grab your seeds and get planting in the annual garden of the year festival!

Nothing says neighbourly love like helping their flower roots thrive underground with some helpful toxic waste. Mrs Rodela and Mr Smithers have garnered the reputation of being amongst the most helpful in the bunch!

And remember: you can’t win if the grass is greener on the other side!

How to play:

Player 1   -   Mrs. Rodela                     Player 2          -   Mr. Smithers            

 WASD     -   Movement                       Arrow Keys   -   Movement                        

     E             -   Interaction                       Enter Key      -   Interaction      

Plant your seeds into the ground to obtain points. Don't let the enemy player place bombs under your garden as it will stagger your point accumulation and make you lose the garden competition!
